verbs.description: While [ARG0: the North Koreans] [V: understood] [ARG1: that Trump ’s cancelation of the June 12 summit with Kim Jong - un was just a ploy] , the two sides are still miles apart on substance .
While the North Koreans understood that [ARG1: Trump ’s cancelation of the June 12 summit with Kim Jong - un] [V: was] [ARG2: just a ploy] , the two sides are still miles apart on substance .

[ARGM-ADV: While the North Koreans understood that Trump ’s cancelation of the June 12 summit with Kim Jong - un was just a ploy] , [ARG1: the two sides] [V: are] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARG2: miles apart on substance] .
